remarks: Version of ~ cbvex4v with a dv condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 .  (Contributed by BJ, 16-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-cbvex4vv.1 $e |- ( ( x = v /\ y = u ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
bj-cbvex4vv.2 $e |- ( ( z = f /\ w = g ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
bj-cbvex4vv $p |- ( E. x E. y E. z E. w ph <-> E. v E. u E. f E. g ch ) $.
$d ch w z $.
$d f g ps $.
$d f g w z $.
$d ph u v $.
$d ps x y $.
$d u v w x y z $.
